Option C: Entering a new prompt such as "Create a promptbook from my session prompts" is not a recognized command in Security Copilot. The system does not support creating promptbooks through natural language prompts.

Option D: Sharing a session allows collaboration but does not provide an option to create a promptbook directly from the shared session. The "Create promptbook" function is separate and requires manual selection of prompts.
